import React,{useState} from 'react'; import "./Header.css"; import { DateRange } from 'react-date-range'; import 'react-date-range/dist/styles.css'; // main css file import 'react-date-range/dist/theme/default.css'; // theme css file import {format} from "date-fns"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faBed, faPlane , faCar, faTaxi, faCalendarDays,faPerson } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' export default function Header(){ const [date, setDate] = useState([ { startDate: new Date(), endDate: new Date(), key: 'selection' } ]); return( <>
